attributes.action: Start legal proceedings against any MP who has committed fraud and deception.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MP, from any party who has obtained monies by fraud or deception from the public purse should be arrested and put on trial.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
